channel.title: sdlc on Organizing Chaos
channel.description: Recent content in sdlc on Organizing Chaos

item.title: Minimize global process
item.description: Global consistency comes at the cost of autonomy; be careful not to stifle what could be your most effective teams

item.title: Go slow to move fast
item.description: Engineering teams can often improve their long-term development velocity by slowing down in the short term.

item.title: Striped development
item.description: Incremental progress on large projects can be achieved by developing functional stripes across the system’s components.
